attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore (the veteran who has raised £12m for NHS) a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: The whole world is suffering due to Covid-19 and healthcare is strained; it's these kinds of acts of heroism that not only bring the country together but help and benefit it, giving us hope in such uncertain times.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has fundraised £12m and counting for the NHS! This is an incredible achievement for our country and one that deserves to be widely recognised and praised! Many of us believe the best way to honour this would be to award him a knighthood!

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
